subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: After four intense years of fund-raising and match racing, Grant Dalton and Dean Barker are ready to start Team New Zealand’s national rehabilitation project in earnest.
snippet: After four intense years of fund-raising and match racing, Grant Dalton and Dean Barker are ready to start Team New Zealand’s national rehabilitation project in earnest.
